content:
The Security Service has blocked another five mobilization evasion schemes and unlawful departure of conscripts abroad.

About thisinformsSecurity Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, as a result of complex measures in different regions of Ukraine, eight organizers of equipment were detained. Among the key involved are the director of the theater and the official of the city registration department of civil status acts.

“For money, the attackers offered the military to avoid conscription and escape abroad on the basis of counterfeit documents. The cost of such "services" was estimated up to $ 10,000. The amount depended on the type of "scheme", - said in the SBU.

In KievSBU counterintelligence detained two residents of the capital who sent the conscript to the European Union under counterfeit documents.

The attackers were looking for potential customers among their friends and offered several departure schemes.

In particular, the defendants designed the evalkers of international flights. Then their personal data was entered into the "Path" system as carriers of medical goods and humanitarian goods.

In addition, for a separate amount, the attackers sold their clients to a temporary residence permit in the territory of the neighboring country of the European Union.

Also, one of the schemes included a fake outbound stamp, in the presence of which the evasants could cross the border with bus flights.

In Kirovograd regionThe director of one of the regional theaters was detained, who for money suited the evasants to the staff of the cultural institution. In this way, the person guaranteed the military with mobilization.

In the DnieperA lawyer who offered potential conscripts is exposed to a fictitious marriage or guardianship of a person with a disability.

The investigation found that he involved four accomplices in unlawful activity, among which was the official of the local department of registration of acts of civil status.

“According to the scheme after registering the" marriage ", the evictor accompanied a woman with disabilities on a trip abroad for her treatment, and a few hours later," wife "returned to Ukraine. Subsequently, she was divorced and registered a new "marriage" ", - the message reads.

Investigation is underway to establish all the circumstances of crimes and prosecute the perpetrators to justice.

Complex measures were conducted with the National Police under the procedural guidance of the prosecutor's office.

As reported by the Armyinform, they detained the recidivist, which“Hunted”According to Ukrainian air defense.
